quote: Fuck the drug war. Dropping acid was a profound turning point for me, a seminal experience. I make no apologies for it. More people should do acid. It should be sold over the counter.
quote_letters: FUCK THE DRUG WAR DROPPING ACID WAS A PROFOUND TURNING POINT FOR ME A SEMINAL EXPERIENCE I MAKE NO APOLOGIES FOR IT MORE PEOPLE SHOULD DO ACID IT SHOULD BE SOLD OVER THE COUNTER
